query:
SELECT 
  s.name,
  MIN(t.entry_date) as first_trade,
  MAX(t.exit_date) as last_trade,
  COUNT(*) as trade_count
FROM strategies s
JOIN trades t ON t.strategy_id = s.id
WHERE s.symbol = 'BTC'
GROUP BY s.id, s.name;
